tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Robotic_Rehabilitation_Progress_Metrics (
  patient_id INT,
  therapy_session_id INT,
  session_date DATE,
  exercise_name VARCHAR(50),
  repetition_count INT,
  duration_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE robotic_assisted_rehabilitation_progress (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapy_date DATE,
  therapy_duration INT,
  session_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE rehabilitation_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  therapy_date DATE,
  therapy_completed BOOLEAN,
  therapist_id INT,
  performance_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE RoboticAssistedRehabilitationProgressMetrics (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id INT,
  date DATE,
  therapy_duration_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE TherapySessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_id INT,
  room_id INT,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  completed BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Therapists (
  therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_name VARCHAR(255),
  specialty VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE exercise_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id INT,
  exercise_name VARCHAR(50),
  reps_completed INT,
  sets_completed INT,
  duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE Robot_Joints (
    joint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    joint_name VARCHAR(50),
    movement_type VARCHAR(50),
    last_recorded_angle FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Patient_Records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    therapy_session_time TIMESTAMP,
    progress_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Therapy_Progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    joint_id INT,
    angle_measurement FLOAT,
    session_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE Therapists (
    therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
    specialization VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    therapist_id INT
)
